Sentencas: Samples of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2, and Ce0.8Sm0.2-xMxO2 (M=La, Y and 0 < x < 0.2) were sintered from fine powders obtained by co-precipitation/calcinations method.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: The preparation method and microstructure of samples are presented and discussed.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: All powders and sinters were found to be ceria-based solid solutions of the fluorite type structure.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: The results of hardness, fracture toughness and bending strength measurements are reported.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: The results of electrical properties of the samples investigated by a.c. impedance spectroscopy in temperature range 100-670 degrees C and for frequency range 10(-2)-10(7) Hz are also presented and discussed.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the ceria samples co-doped are found to be improved.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: The best oxygen-ion conductivity was found for Ce0.8Sm0.1Y0.1O2 compound.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system

Sentencas: Testing results of this compound used as an electrolyte in oxygen-ion concentration cell are also reported.
Titulo: Electrical and mechanical properties of CeO2-based electrolytes in the CeO2-Sm2O3-M2O3 (M=La,Y) system
